name: Luck Teller
description:
I am on vacation but wanted to make a game for the GMTK Game Jam 2022 on my little spare time. So I made a small game where you roll the dice up to 5 times to progress through levels and find out how lucky you are.

Try your luck!

Controls :

-Press any key or the click the button to roll the dice.

-Press R to try again.

Best of luck!
